adHeader: Party Princesses - Frozen Elsa Anna, Ariel, Tinkerbell and more
adDetails: Bring your party to life with Kool Kidz Parties! We are Professional kids entertainers with years of experience! Our princess performers can perform princess lessons, 30 minute magic shows, 20 minute puppet shows, face painting, balloon twisting, party games, dancing, and parachute fun. They will also pose for pictures and stay for the cake cutting. We also have mascot characters, clowns, fairies, petting zoos and more. Prices are $175-$325 depending on the amount of activities you want to include and number of kids you're hosting. party deposits required to reserve all performers.
